description: Welcome to Solana After Hours! Join us for drinks and canap s during 2026 Consensus Hong Kong where SNS gathers Jito, Mayan, Solflare and Nansen for a fun night out! Venue - The Trilogy Last year we had so much fun and support from The Trilogy, this year we are coming back to the same venue, another level of hype and atmosphere! Located on the 26th floor of H Code in Central, a rooftop bar offering stunning city views. With its blend of music, nightlife, and chic atmosphere, The Trilogy is the perfect spot for an unforgettable experience in the heart of the city.
